title: I was confused why my account banned
body: The day before yesterday, I don't know what reason my account had been banned, it said that check my e-mail but I got nothing on my email. So I really confused why my account banned I spent 4000 dollars on this game.

replies.body: It doesn't actually look like this account is banned, but that there was some suspicious activity happening. Hit up our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they'll be able to work with you to get you back in the game.
You should contact Riot Support through a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) and ask why your account was banned.
